thread.title: Outstanding Hotel & Food!
thread.title_full: Outstanding Hotel & Food! - Review of La Reserve Paris - Hotel and Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel J
title: Outstanding Hotel & Food!
text: Stayed at this Hotel for one evening on the 21st of July when visiting for the Beyonc√© concert and have never stayed anywhere like it in my life. The attention to detail in all of the bars, lounge areas, outdoor areas and the room were just amazing. I was lucky enough to have 4 balconies all with amazing views and all the mod cons you could wish for right down to the toilet. (I'm a big kid so couldn't stop waving my hand over the automatic toilet lid) We called room service for drinks and food on a few occasions and wasn't left waiting long. Great food, amazing service and could go on and on. Would most definitely stay here again! Photos I have attached really don't do the hotel justice in real life!
